verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, cause Jerusalem <WH3389> to know <WH3045> her abominations <WH8441>,

And say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069> unto Jerusalem <WH3389>; Your birth <WH4351> and your nativity <WH4138> is of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3669>; your father <WH1> was a Amorite <WH567>, and your mother <WH517> a Hittite <WH2850>.

And as for your nativity <WH4138>, in the day <WH3117> you were born <WH3205> your navel <WH8270> was not cut <WH3772>, neither were you washed <WH7364> in water <WH4325> to cleanse <WH4935> you <WH4414>; you were not salted at all <WH4414>, nor swaddled <WH2853> at all <WH2853>.

No eye <WH5869> pitied <WH2347> you <WH6213>, to do any <WH259> of these unto you <WH2550>, to have compassion upon you <WH7993>; but you were cast out in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>, to the loathing <WH1604> of your person <WH5315>, in the day <WH3117> that you were born <WH3205>.

And when I passed <WH5674> by you <WH7200>, and saw you covered <WH947> in your own blood <WH1818>, I said <WH559> unto you when you were in your blood <WH1818>, Live <WH2421>; Yes <WH559>, I said unto you when you were in your blood <WH1818>, Live <WH2421>.

I have caused <WH5414> you to multiply <WH7233> as the bud <WH6780> of the field <WH7704>, and you have increased <WH7235> and grown great <WH1431>, and you have come <WH935> to excellent <WH5716> ornaments <WH5716>: your breasts <WH7699> are fashioned <WH3559>, and your hair <WH8181> is grown <WH6779>, where you were naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>.

Now when I passed <WH5674> by you <WH7200>, and looked upon you <WH6256>, behold, your time was the time <WH6256> of love <WH1730>; and I spread <WH6566> my skirt <WH3671> over you <WH3680>, and covered your nakedness <WH6172>: Yes <WH7650>, I swore unto you <WH935>, and entered into a covenant <WH1285> with you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, and you became mine.
Then washed <WH7364> I you with water <WH4325>; Yes <WH7857>, I throughly washed away your blood <WH1818> from you <WH5480>, and I anointed you with oil <WH8081>.

I clothed <WH3847> you also with embroidered work <WH7553>, and shod <WH5274> you with badgers <WH8476>' skin, and I dressed <WH2280> you in fine linen <WH8336>, and I covered <WH3680> you with silk <WH4897>.
I decked <WH5710> you also with ornaments <WH5716>, and I put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> upon your hands <WH3027>, and a chain <WH7242> on your neck <WH1627>.
And I put <WH5414> a jewel <WH5141> on your forehead <WH639>, and earrings <WH5694> in your ears <WH241>, and a beautiful <WH8597> crown <WH5850> upon your head <WH7218>.

Thus were you decked <WH5710> with gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>; and your clothes <WH4403> were of fine linen <WH8336>, and silk <WH4897>, and embroidered work <WH7553>; you did eat <WH398> fine flour <WH5560>, and honey <WH1706>, and oil <WH8081>: and you were exceedingly <WH3966> beautiful <WH3302>, and you did prosper <WH6743> into a kingdom <WH4410>.

And your renown <WH8034> went forth <WH3318> among the heathen <WH1471> for your beauty <WH3308>: for it was perfect <WH3632> through my comeliness <WH1926>, which I had put <WH7760> upon you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

But you did trust <WH982> in your own beauty <WH3308>, and played the prostitute <WH2181> because of your renown <WH8034>, and poured out <WH8210> your fornications <WH8457> on every one that passed by <WH5674>; his it was.

And of your garments <WH899> you did take <WH3947>, and decked <WH6213> your high places <WH1116> with various colors <WH2921>, and played the prostitute <WH2181> thereupon <WH935>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You have also taken <WH3947> your fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627> of my gold <WH2091> and of my silver <WH3701>, which I had given <WH5414> you <WH6213>, and made to yourself images <WH6754> of men <WH2145>, and did commit whoredom with them <WH2181>,
And took <WH3947> your embroidered <WH7553> garments <WH899>, and covered <WH3680> them <WH5414>: and you have set my oil <WH8081> and my incense <WH7004> before them <WH6440>.

My food <WH3899> also which I gave <WH5414> you <WH5560>, fine flour, and oil <WH8081>, and honey <WH1706>, with which I fed <WH398> you <WH5414>, you have even set it before <WH6440> them for a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381>: and thus it was <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

Moreover you have taken <WH3947> your sons <WH1121> and your daughters <WH1323>, whom you have borne <WH3205> unto me <WH2076>, and these have you sacrificed unto them to be devoured <WH398>. Is this of your whoredoms <WH8457> a small matter <WH4592>,
That you have slain <WH7819> my sons <WH1121>, and delivered <WH5414> them to cause them to pass through the fire for them <WH5674>?

And in all your abominations <WH8441> and your whoredoms <WH8457> you have not remembered <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of your youth <WH5271>, when you were naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>, and were polluted <WH947> in your blood <WH1818>.
And it came to pass after <WH310> all your wickedness <WH7451>, (woe <WH188>, woe <WH188> unto you says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>;)
That you have also built <WH1129> unto you an eminent place <WH1354>, and have made <WH6213> yourselves a high place <WH7413> in every street <WH7339>.

You have built <WH1129> your high place <WH7413> at every head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870>, and have made your beauty <WH3308> to be abhorred <WH8581>, and have opened <WH6589> your feet <WH7272> to every one that passed by <WH5674>, and multiplied <WH7235> your whoredoms <WH8457>.

You have also committed fornication <WH2181> with the Egyptians <WH1121> your neighbors <WH7934>, great <WH1432> of flesh <WH1320>; and have increased <WH7235> your whoredoms <WH8457>, to provoke me to anger <WH3707>.

Behold <WH5186>, therefore I have stretched out my hand <WH3027> over you <WH1639>, and have diminished your ordinary <WH2706> food <WH5414>, and delivered you unto the will <WH5315> of them that hate <WH8130> you <WH1323>, the daughters of the Philistines <WH6430>, which are ashamed <WH3637> of your lewd <WH2154> way <WH1870>.

You have played the whore <WH2181> also with the Assyrians <WH1121>, because <WH1115> you were insatiable <WH7646>; Yes <WH2181>, you have played the prostitute with them <WH7654>, and yet could not be satisfied.
You have moreover multiplied <WH7235> your fornication <WH8457> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> unto Chaldea <WH3778>; and yet you were not satisfied <WH7646> herewith <WH2063>.

How weak <WH535> is your heart <WH3826>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, seeing you do <WH6213> all these things <WH4639>, the work of a imperious <WH7986> whorish <WH2181> woman <WH802>;

In that you build <WH1129> your eminent place <WH1354> in the head <WH7218> of every way <WH1870>, and make <WH6213> your high place <WH7413> in every street <WH7339>; and have not been as a prostitute <WH2181>, in that you scorn <WH7046> hire <WH868>;
But as a wife <WH802> that commits adultery <WH5003>, which takes <WH3947> strangers <WH2114> instead of her husband <WH376>!

They give <WH5414> gifts <WH5078> to all whores <WH2181>: but you give <WH5414> your gifts <WH5083> to all your lovers <WH157>, and hire <WH7809> them <WH935>, that they may come unto you on every side <WH5439> for your whoredom <WH8457>.

And you are different <WH2016> from other women <WH802> in your whoredoms <WH8457>, whereas none follows <WH310> you to commit whoredoms <WH2181>: and in that you give <WH5414> a reward <WH868>, and no reward <WH868> is given <WH5414> unto you <WH1961>, in that you are different <WH2016>.
Therefore <WH2181>, O prostitute, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>:

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because your filthiness <WH5178> was poured out <WH8210>, and your nakedness <WH6172> discovered <WH1540> through your whoredoms <WH8457> with your lovers <WH157>, and with all the idols <WH1544> of your abominations <WH8441>, and by the blood <WH1818> of your sons <WH1121>, which you did give unto them <WH5414>;

Behold <WH6908>, therefore I will gather all your lovers <WH157>, with whom you have taken pleasure <WH6149>, and all them that you have loved <WH157>, with all them that you have hated <WH8130>; I will even gather <WH6908> them round about <WH5439> against you <WH1540>, and will uncover your nakedness <WH6172> unto them <WH7200>, that they may see all your nakedness <WH6172>.

And I will judge <WH8199> you <WH5003>, as women that break wedlock and shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818> are judged <WH4941>; and I will give <WH5414> you blood <WH1818> in fury <WH2534> and jealousy <WH7068>.

And I will also give <WH5414> you into their hand <WH3027>, and they shall throw down <WH2040> your eminent place <WH1354>, and shall break down <WH5422> your high places <WH7413>: they shall strip <WH6584> you also of your clothes <WH899>, and shall take <WH3947> your fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627>, and leave <WH3240> you naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>.
They shall also bring up <WH5927> a company <WH6951> against you <WH7275>, and they shall stone you with stones <WH68>, and thrust you through <WH1333> with their swords <WH2719>.

And they shall burn <WH8313> your houses <WH1004> with fire <WH784>, and execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> upon you in the sight <WH5869> of many <WH7227> women <WH802>: and I will cause you to cease <WH7673> from playing the prostitute <WH2181>, and you also shall give <WH5414> no hire any more <WH868>.
So will I make my fury <WH2534> toward you to rest <WH5117>, and my jealousy <WH7068> shall depart <WH5493> from you <WH8252>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry <WH3707>.

Because you have not remembered <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of your youth <WH5271>, but have fretted <WH7264> me in all these things <WH1887>; behold, therefore I also will recompense <WH5414> your way <WH1870> upon your head <WH7218>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>: and you shall not commit <WH6213> this lewdness <WH2154> above all your abominations <WH8441>.
Behold <WH4911>, every one that uses proverbs shall use this proverb <WH4911> against you <WH559>, saying, As is the mother <WH517>, so is her daughter <WH1323>.

You are your mother <WH517>'s daughter <WH1323>, that loathes <WH1602> her husband <WH376> and her sons <WH1121>; and you are the sister <WH269> of your sisters <WH269>, which loathed <WH1602> their husbands <WH582> and their sons <WH1121>: your mother <WH517> was a Hittite <WH2850>, and your father <WH1> an Amorite <WH567>.

And your elder <WH1419> sister <WH269> is Samaria <WH8111>, she and her daughters <WH1323> that live <WH3427> at your left hand <WH8040>: and your younger <WH6996> sister <WH269>, that dwells <WH3427> at your right hand <WH3225>, is Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>.

Yet have you not walked <WH1980> after their ways <WH1870>, nor done <WH6213> after their abominations <WH8441>: but <WH6985>, as if that were a very little <WH4592> thing <WH7843>, you were corrupted more than they <WH2004> in all your ways <WH1870>.

As I live <WH2416>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, Sodom <WH5467> your sister <WH269> has not done <WH6213>, she nor her daughters <WH1323>, as you have done <WH6213>, you and your daughters <WH1323>.

Behold <WH5771>, this was the iniquity of your sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467>, pride <WH1347>, fullness <WH7653> of bread <WH3899>, and abundance <WH7962> of idleness <WH8252> was in her and in her daughters <WH1323>, neither did she strengthen <WH2388> the hand <WH3027> of the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>.
And they were haughty <WH1361>, and committed <WH6213> abomination <WH8441> before <WH6440> me <WH5493>: therefore I took them away as I saw good <WH7200>.

Neither has Samaria <WH8111> committed <WH2398> half <WH2677> of your sins <WH2403>; but you have multiplied <WH7235> your abominations <WH8441> more than they <WH2007>, and have justified <WH6663> your sisters <WH269> in all your abominations <WH8441> which you have done <WH6213>.

You also <WH6419>, which have judged your sisters <WH269>, bear <WH5375> your own shame <WH3639> for your sins <WH2403> that you have committed more abominable <WH8581> than they <WH2004>: they are more righteous <WH6663> than you <WH954>: Yes, be you confounded also <WH5375>, and bear your shame <WH3639>, in that you have justified <WH6663> your sisters <WH269>.

When I shall bring again <WH7725> their captivity <WH7622>, the captivity <WH7622> of Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>, and the captivity <WH7622> of Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323>, then will I bring again the captivity <WH7622> of your captives <WH7622> in the midst of them <WH8432>:
That you may bear <WH5375> your own shame <WH3639>, and may be confounded <WH3637> in all that you have done <WH6213>, in that you are a comfort unto them <WH5162>.

When your sisters <WH269>, Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>, shall return <WH7725> to their former estate <WH6927>, and Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to their former estate <WH6927>, then you and your daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to your former estate <WH6927>.
For your sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> was not mentioned <WH8052> by your mouth <WH6310> in the day <WH3117> of your pride <WH1347>,

Before your wickedness <WH7451> was discovered <WH1540>, as at the time <WH6256> of your reproach <WH2781> of the daughters <WH1323> of Syria <WH758>, and all that are round about <WH5439> her <WH1323>, the daughters of the Philistines <WH6430>, which despise <WH7590> you round about <WH5439>.
You have borne <WH5375> your lewdness <WH2154> and your abominations <WH8441>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>.

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will even deal <WH6213> with you as you have done <WH6213>, which have despised <WH959> the oath <WH423> in breaking <WH6565> the covenant <WH1285>.
Nevertheless I will remember <WH2142> my covenant <WH1285> with you in the days <WH3117> of your youth <WH5271>, and I will establish <WH6965> unto you a everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>.

Then you shall remember <WH2142> your ways <WH1870>, and be ashamed <WH3637>, when you shall receive <WH3947> your sisters <WH269>, your elder <WH1419> and your younger <WH6996>: and I will give <WH5414> them unto you for daughters <WH1323>, but not by your covenant <WH1285>.
And I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with you <WH3045>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>:

That you may remember <WH2142>, and be confounded <WH954>, and never open <WH6610> your mouth <WH6310> any more because <WH6440> of your shame <WH3639>, when I am pacified <WH3722> toward you for all that you have done <WH6213>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.
